amendment.description: To expand the incentives for the construction and renovation of public schools.

vote.text: Amendment SA 618 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 618 proposed by Senator Rockefeller. (consideration: CR S6439-6440) To expand the incentives for the construction and renovation of public schools.
